subSections.title: Japanese
Readings
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|しょう|yomi=o}}
From {{der|ja|sort=しょう|ltc|笙|tr=*shræng}}. [[呉音#Japanese|Goon]], so likely the original reading as first borrowed from {{cog|ltc|-}}. Compare modern {{cog|cmn|笙|tr=shēng}}.

subSections.title: Noun
Derived terms
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|笙の笛|しょう の ふえ}}: a type of [[simplified]] sho used as a [[toy]]
* {{ja-r|笙歌|しょうか}}, {{ja-r|笙歌|せいか}}: [[singing]] to a sho [[accompaniment]]; to [[sing]] to a sho accompaniment; a [[song]] [[sung]] to a sho accompaniment
* {{ja-r|笙岩屋|^しょう の ^いわや}}, {{ja-r|笙窟|^しょう の ^いわや}}: a [[cave]] and [[pilgrimage]] [[destination]] in central [[w:Nara Prefecture|Nara Prefecture]]
* {{ja-r|鳳笙|ほうしょう}}: [[sho]]
* {{ja-r|蘆笙|ろしょう}}

subSections.title: Etymology 2
